trends: There have been 3 other sightings in San Anselmo
There were no other sightings in San Anselmo on or around October 25th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi was looking out of my window at the stars with my granddaughter. in the distance approximately 8-10 city blocks away the following object suddenly fell in the sky into our vision and hovered for maybe a minute: it looked like a large, perfectly formed circle with flames of fire all around the circumference; the flames were all the same height all the way around. the next day i called the police dept and they said no one had reported anything, but today (10\27) the dispatcher called and told me she had read in the santa rosa press democrat that people were calling in from sf to fort bragg late on the night of the 25th to say they saw flashes of lights (some green) in the sky. the coast guard said it was a meteor shower. what i saw was definitely not a meteor shower. it looked like a giant candelbra with huge flames but there is no explanation that i can think of. i have seen a ufo before but don't know what to make of this.
